text:
Mohamed Abdelaziz (; 17 August 1947 – 31 May 2016) was the 3rd Secretary General of the Polisario Front and President of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic from 1976 until his death in 2016.
Abdelaziz died on 31 May 2016 from lung cancer, aged 68.

annotations.surface_form: Secretary General of the Polisario Front
President of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic
